entry.title: hard to love in the cold
entry.summary:
Author: sleepdeprivedphilosopher

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,131Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 13

Summary: “Wait,” Jason says. “B, you ate alone when you were a kid?” “Yes,” Bruce says. “Unless I had a guest over, which was rare. I usually ate alone.” Dick looks shocked, and Tim is admittedly feeling that same emotion. He’s picturing a nine-year-old Bruce in this big dining room, sitting in a chair that’s too big for him, being served dinner, but eating alone. It is a familiar picture. Tim knows that picture well. “So when I moved into the manor,” Dick trails off. “It was the first time I consistently had someone to eat with, yes,” Bruce finishes. Bruce is used to being alone. Even now, surrounded by so many people who support him, he still sees himself as that lonely eight-year-old boy who lost everything to a gun. The last time he believed in love was when his parents were alive. Ever since then, he’s only seen love as something he’ll ruin. Now Bruce is finally in a place where he can question the origins of that worldview. The answer, however, will shake the foundations of his life and the family he’s managed to build.

entry.title: We're gonna walk on water. There is no need to swim.
entry.summary:
Author: babbzz

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 29,106Chapters: 2/3Kudos: 96

Summary: Damian Al-Ghul does not get sick. He is the son of the Batman.Heir to the Demon’s Head.The future of the Bat mantle, the pride of his parents, the successor his brothers watch with wary admiration. He does not get sick. Not when he goes under in the Gotham harbor.Not when filthy water fills his lungs and drags him down.Not when he drags himself home, bruised and shaking.Not when the fever blooms behind his eyes the next morning. No.Because Damian Al-Ghul does not get sick.Sickness is weakness, and Damian Al-Ghul is never weak. …right? He's not sick. Not when the fever climbs, when breathing becomes a battle he can’t win alone, when the river’s infection sinks its teeth into his lungs and blood- No. He's fine. Damian Al-Ghul does not get sick. That would imply weakness. And he is an unstoppable, invincible, ten-year-old war assassin- …who maybe, possibly, hypothetically should not be coughing like that. Or swaying like that. Or unable to get up anymore. No. Because Damian Al-Ghul doesn’t get sick. (Except, apparently… Damian Wayne does. He absolutely does.)

entry.title: Your Love Is So (Hurt) Heartful
entry.summary:
Author: Ocyus_Stuff

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 58,677Chapters: 3/6Kudos: 1,447

Summary: Your father’s child body should not have been covered in bruises and broken bones.His youngest brother brought little Bruce’s hand up, resting his forehead against the back of B’s hands. “You were supposed to be safe”, he growled into Bruce’s hand. He emphasised the word safe, spat the word out with so much offense that as if with enough strength, Damian could will his wish into existence and rewrite this cruel moment of Bruce’s past and morph it into something kinder, something more befitting for a man who will spend the rest of his adulthood covered in the same kind of bruises and walk the earth with bones broken ten, twenty times over from protecting a city that bites the hands that try to hold it with even the slightest hint of kindness and later, from protecting the whole world with the strength of his heart and the wit of his mind as his greatest weapon.“You were supposed to be l—" Damian’s breath hitched, and it was a terrible sound.Loved. Dick finished in his heart. You were supposed to be loved.

entry.title: Just A Totally Normal Average Human Family
entry.summary:
Author: concur

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,331Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 21

Summary: “Hello! I am Thor Odinson, a human person who hails from this planet. I like normal activities like sportsball and eating.” Thor grinned with far too many teeth. Tim and Duke stared back blankly. “I am Loki.” The slender figure behind spoke tiredly. “… Nice to meet you.” Duke eventually managed. —-OR Loki, Thor and their parents get dropped in Gotham. They decide to blend in and pass themselves off as average mortals. It goes exactly how you’d expect.

entry.title: Red Rover, Red Rover, Send Robin on Over
entry.summary:
Author: CaptainBrookeworm

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,416Chapters: 3/4Kudos: 220

Summary: “I will drive,” Damian announces. “No.” Jason grabs him by the scruff of his robes before he can squirm away. “Tim’s driving.” Damian whirls, eyes bright. “I am perfectly capable-” “Yes, Damian, you are, but you’re also too short to reach the pedals.”Jason’s honestly surprised he doesn’t get a knife in the gut for that. Tim is wise enough to keep his mouth shut. Wise - Jason decides firmly - but also breathtakingly stupid, because he takes two steps away from the truck and almost falls flat on his face when his injured leg gives out.Jason catches him, right in time for him to say, “Right. Stab wound. Forgot about that.” Jason sighs, casts his gaze to the sky, and mentally apologizes to Bruce. He’s herding cats here. He and Dick weren’t this bad, were they? (They were, he knows they were, which just makes this whole fiasco even more annoying.) - OR: Damian, Jason, and Tim meet as prisoners of the League of Assassins and make that everyone else’s problem

entry.title: Power
entry.summary:
Author: ope-uh-oh (shortjacketlongskirt)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 95,447Chapters: 19/?Kudos: 226

Summary: “Oh, you do like to flirt, don’t you?” Lex accused almost playfully, if not for the sharklike emptiness in his eyes. Bruce sat back as the appetizer plates were taken away and replaced with the entrée: filet mignon in a mushroom gravy, served with truffles, asparagus, and black garlic potatoes. He couldn’t help but think Clark would have appreciated this. And he desperately wished he was here with him rather than Vicki. He flashed a playful grin at Lex. “Flirting is what makes the world go round, Lex. What is that quote attributed to Oscar Wilde? ‘Everything in the world is about sex except sex, which is about power’. It applies to everything. Make people think you want them, and you’ve got the whole world in your hands.” After years of living in the closet, trying to ignore the truth, Bruce is finally cornered and is forced to come out in a very public way. This leads to a series of challenges, blending his public and private life in way he can’t escape.

entry.title: The Grayson Effect
entry.summary:
Author: pansley

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,865Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 79

Summary: With Jason gone, Batman and Robin are stretched too thin. New villains seem to be arriving — or returning — almost every day. Gotham is left in a constant state of restoration. And the truce between Bruce and his two eldest sons is tenuous at best, and dangerously volatile at worst. It would be the absolute worst time for his youngest to be abducted. Or: Dick finds himself at the mercy of the older brother he didn’t know he had. Saving himself might just mean saving Damian, too.

entry.title: Operation: Beyond the Veil
entry.summary:
Author: Hasunohana

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,675Chapters: 5/5Kudos: 43

Summary: World peace has finally arrived—and the Justice League is savoring every second. All except Bruce, whose sharp instincts sense the storm approaching while the rest of the world relaxs. He was right. When the Circle of the Black Blood resurges under the command of the vengeful Archmage Vikram Seth, a confrontation in Mumbai ends in tragedy: Bruce, Oliver, and Shayera are struck by an arcane curse that causes black rosebushes to sprout from their wounds, consuming them alive. With time running out and conventional magic failing, Clark is forced to break through Bruce's final barrier and reveal a secret not even the League knew: the existence of two interdimensionaly powerful mages living hidden right under everyone's noses… in Gotham. Now, the League's last hope rests with Bruce's most closely guarded friends—and the magical sanctuary they call home.

entry.title: I’ll Find You in the Morning Sun
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,342Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 57

Summary: Bruce knows he came back wrong, because he feels them all before he even really wakes up. He’s lying on the cot in the Cave – that much he can tell amidst the fog he seems to be floating in, trying to reach toward consciousness – the fabric scratching at his back even through the Kevlar of his under-armor. His ears pick up the rumble of voices above him and, farther and higher, the chattering of bats, as clearly as if they were right beside him.He can smell his family around him: Dick’s faint cologne to his right by the cot, Alfred’s too, as well as the hint of Earl Grey tea he must have drunk a couple of hours earlier before they all returned from patrol. He smells the leather of Tim’s gloves, standing a few meters to his left alongside Duke and Cassandra. Gunpowder from Jason’s weapons and the residue on his hands. And Damian, who smells faintly like Gotham’s rain and his herbal shampoo, but is also covered in the heavy, unmistakable stench of cat and dog.Titus, Bruce’s mind supplies, and Alfred the cat. He scrunches his nose, surprised by how violently the smell irritates him.Or: after an encounter with their villains of the week, Bruce finds himself turned into a monster.

entry.title: I Work Alone
entry.summary:
Author: NotCassia

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 855Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 432

Summary: Stephanie stood still as a statue the instant she felt a smooth surface against her face. "Whose butt is in my face?" Her words came out as a whisper, muffled to near inaudibility by Batman's cape. She was the most quiet out of the growing cacophony of harsh whispers. But that didn't last when said smooth surface neither identified itself nor moved away from her face. "Whose metallic butt is in my face!?" "Grayson, you said there was a stash of candy in one of these compartments—where is it!" Nightwing was just about to show Damian the compartment where Bruce kept lollipops, mostly to comfort kids. And he made sure to do so with haste because the supposed "World's Greatest Detective" kept them in a compartment literally right next to his similarly circular smoke-bombs. That's when he felt the sharp end of a batarang nip at his butt. "OW!—....who the fuck just poked me in the butt--" "--SO IT WAS YOU!" "Why is Jason even in here, he's too big to fit." "Oh I know you're not the one talking." "... what's that supposed to mean?" "It means lay off the late night snacking." Unison gasps "Jason..."

entry.title: Another Perspective
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 33,381Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 249

Summary: A clash of opposing plans causes Batman to accidentally be doused with a hybrid of not-quite-Fear Toxin and Ivy's pheromones. In order to cope with the opposing influences, his brain convinces him that the four Rogues who were keyed to them - Scarecrow, Ivy, Harley Quinn, and Riddler - have been deaged into children. Obviously he'll have to bring them home and look after them until an antidote is made. Meanwhile, by order of the Batkids in order to NOT break Batman's mind, said Rogues are forced to play along.
